channel.title: Getting Started on Meal Manager
channel.description: Recent content in Getting Started on Meal Manager

item.title: Download and Install
item.description: Our Meal Manager app is currently available for free on Google Play. Please click the button below to install it on your device. Install Meal Manager

item.title: Log In
item.description: If you have just installed our app, it is time for a new experience. After opening the app for the first time, it will show you Log In screen with the following options: Are you a Manager? If you are a manager, choose the Yes button beside the text that says Are you a manager?. It will take you to the next screen where you will be asked to input your Username and Password.
